main.name: Muhammad Zubair
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I’m a Front-End Developer specializing in React.js, with a strong background in project management. I studied at Ravensbourne University London, where I refined my skills in web development. I’ve worked as a Senior Developer and Team Lead at Dynamic Logix, and also contributed to building dynamic websites and API integrations at MZH Production. I'm passionate about creating efficient, user-friendly web applications.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out if you'd like to discuss a project, collaborate, or have any questions. You can contact me at m.zubair.h1999@gmail.com. I look forward to connecting!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I studied at Ravensbourne University London, where I honed my skills in React.js front-end development and project management.

work.title: Senior UI-UX Developer
work.description: I worked at Dynamic Logix as a Senior Developer and Team Lead, where I led projects and further developed my expertise in React.js and team management.

work.title: Front-end Developer
work.description: I worked at MZH Production, where I served as a Senior Developer and Team Lead. During my time there, I played a key role in developing dynamic websites using React.js, while also managing and integrating APIs to ensure seamless functionality across various platforms. I led a team of developers, overseeing project timelines, collaborating on complex features, and ensuring high-quality deliverables for clients.
